New Records: Dasun Shanaka scored the fastest fifty by a Sri Lankan batsman in the T20 format, reaching his half-century in 20 balls.
Key Match Events: Dasun Shanaka hit an unbeaten 56 off 22 balls with two fours and six sixes.
Kasun Rajitha led the bowling attack, taking 2 wickets for 22 runs.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 51 runs and Axar Patel scored 65 runs in a 91-run sixth-wicket stand.
Shanaka dismissed Axar Patel and Shivam Mavi in the final over to secure the win.
Kusal Mendis scored 52 off 31 balls, contributing to an 80-run partnership with Pathum Nissanka.
Post-Match Reflections: Dasun Shanaka expressed satisfaction with defending the total against India.
Hardik Pandya criticized the no-balls bowled by Arshdeep Singh, calling it a 'crime'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep Singh bowled five no-balls in the innings.
Sri Lanka scored 77 runs in the final five overs of their innings.
